Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 3.8 Å × 3.8 Å (large aperture), 2.5 Å × 2.5 Å (small aperture)
Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: 3D framework with interconnected channels and cavities

Other Information.Test Conditions: Varied temperatures (25 K, 40 K, 60 K), 1000 mbar pressure
Other Information.Additional Info: H2 eluted first in breakthrough experiments at 77 K.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Varied temperatures (25 K, 40 K, 60 K), 1000 mbar pressure
Other Information.Additional Info: D2 exhibited stronger interaction and remained longer in the column during breakthrough experiments at 77 K.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale through Kinetic Quantum Sieving

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: D2/H2 selectivity of 11.9 at 25 K and 1 bar exposure pressure; D2/H2 selectivity of approximately 1.6 at 77 K

Other Information.Additional Info: SSZ-13 demonstrated robustness under ionizing radiation doses up to 9 MGy.
